title.narrative: Support to UN Women/Gender equality in finantial systems
Support to UN Women/Gender equality in finantial systems

description.narrative:
Den föreslagna insatsen är ett ettårigt stöd som kommer att genomföras av UN WOMEN landskontor i Bolivia. Med insatsen syftar man att stärka kunskapen om kvinnornas tillgång till finansiella instrument i Bolivia genom att genomföra tre studier, resultaten av studierna kommer att stödja genomförandet av normativa och operationella utvecklingen av finansiella tjänster och produkter som är tillgängliga för kvinnor, för att främja kvinnors ekonomiska egenmakt i Bolivia. Detta kommer även att stödja UN WOMENs programmatiska arbete inom ramen för kvinnornas ekonomisk egen makt för den kommande för perioden 2020-2022. Insatsen syftar även stärka kvinnliga nätverk och organisationen för kvinnliga privata entreprenörer.
Den uppskattad budget är 1200 000 MSEK och kommer enbart att genomföras av UN Women Bolivia. Inga överföringar kommer att göras till andra partner.

The proposed action is a one-year grant that will be implemented by the UN WOMEN Country Office in Bolivia. This contribution aims to strengthen knowledge about women's access to financial instruments in Bolivia by conducting three studies, the results will support the implementation of normative and operational development of financial services and products available, to promote women's economic empowerment in Bolivia. This will also support UN WOMEN's programmatic work in the area of women's economic empowerment for the coming period 2020-2022. The initiative also aims to strengthen women's networks and organization for private entrepreneurs.
The estimated budget is SEK 1,200,000 million and will only be implemented by UN Women Bolivia. No transfers will be made to other partners.

Through the project Analysis of financial services through a gender focus, UN Women in Bolivia sought to generate evidence about women's financial inclusion; to raise awareness about gender inequalities in accessing financial products and services; and to create a network of key actors to make a change.

participating-org.narrative: UNWOMEN/United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women
UNWOMEN/United Nations Entity for Gender Equality and the Empowerment of Women

sector.narrative: Education/training in banking and financial services

tag.narrative: 5.a - Genomföra reformer för att ge kvinnor lika rätt till ekonomiska resurser, möjlighet att äga och kontrollera mark och andra former av egendom samt tillgång till finansiella tjänster, arv och naturresurser, i enlighet med nationell lagstiftning

5.a - Undertake reforms to give women equal rights to economic resources, as well as access to ownership and control over land and other forms of property, financial services, inheritance and natural resources, in accordance with national laws.

Reproductive, Maternal, Newborn and Child Health (RMNCH)

description.narrative: Thanks to the implementation of this project, data on financial inclusion in Bolivia was disaggregated by sex and strategies were generated to develop financial services and products that adapt to the needs of women, with a focus on women entrepreneurs and businesswomen.
No indicator available - only a description of the activity results is published
